metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a comprehensive literature review focusing on methodologies, datasets, and performance benchmarks

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Computational biology involves the application of data-analytical and theoretical methods, mathematical
modeling, and computational simulation techniques to the study of biological systems.
Key Methodologies
Sequence alignment, structural bioinformatics, systems biology, and molecular modeling are core
methodologies.
Tools like BLAST, ClustalW, and molecular dynamics simulations are frequently used.
Case Studies and Applications
Applications include gene expression analysis, protein structure prediction, and simulation of cellular
processes.
The field is rapidly evolving with AI-driven insights and high-throughput experimentation becoming central.
